wbedtf-desc: Adds support for the EDTF standard to Wikibase via a dedicated data type
wikibase-listdatatypes-edtf-body:
A date or time in the [https://www.loc.gov/standards/datetime/ Extended Date/Time Format (EDTF)] format.

This format is available because the [https://github.com/ProfessionalWiki/WikibaseEdtf Wikibase EDTF extension] is enabled. See the extension's [https://github.com/ProfessionalWiki/WikibaseEdtf#wikibase-edtf documentation] for more information about usage.
